xmlText.p: First Period_1, Columbus, Anderson 16 (Jokinen, Dubois), 6:12 (pp). 2, N.Y. Islanders, Leddy 7 (Tavares, Barzal), 17:38 (pp). Penalties_Cizikas, NYI, (hooking), 4:43; Dubinsky, CBJ, (holding), 16:54.

Second Period_3, N.Y. Islanders, Bailey 13 (Pulock, Beauvillier), 11:14. 4, Columbus, Atkinson 8 (Panarin), 12:36. 5, Columbus, Foligno 10 (Bjorkstrand), 18:03. Penalties_Nelson, NYI, (cross checking), 12:56.

Third Period_6, N.Y. Islanders, Eberle 18 (Cizikas, Barzal), 2:49. 7, N.Y. Islanders, Nelson 11 (Ladd, Pulock), 5:14. Penalties_Dubois, CBJ, (slashing), 3:12; Anderson, CBJ, (cross checking), 10:08; Chimera, NYI, (cross checking), 10:08; Mayfield, NYI, (delay of game), 13:28.
Power-play opportunities_Columbus 1 of 3; N.Y. Islanders 1 of 2.
Goalies_Columbus, Korpisalo 5-5-0 (38 shots-34 saves). N.Y. Islanders, Halak 16-15-3 (49-46).
